cta.title: Join CTF-Kongress!
cta.description: Become part of the network for CTF enthusiasts

sponsors.title: Our partners
sponsors.interested: Interested in becoming a partner? Contact us!

teams.title: CTF teams and competitions in Sweden
teams.subtitle: Discover active Capture the Flag teams and competitions around the country and see where they are located
teams.no_teams: No teams found with the search term

missing_team.title: Is your team missing?
missing_team.description: Are you on a team that's not on the list? Write in the CTF-Kongress Discord!

ctfkongress.title: CTF-Kongress
ctfkongress.subtitle: Sweden's network for Capture The Flag enthusiasts

network.title: About the network
network.description: CTF-Kongress is a network that brings together individuals, teams, and organizations interested in Capture The Flag (CTF) in Sweden. We serve as a platform for knowledge sharing, collaboration, and development in the cybersecurity field with a focus on CTF competitions.
network.membership: With over 200 members from across the country, we represent a broad spectrum of knowledge and experience in cybersecurity.

goals.title: Our goals
goals.item1: To gather CTF-Sweden and create meetings within the scene
goals.item2: To promote knowledge exchange between CTF players and teams in Sweden
goals.item3: To promote CTF as a competition format

join.title: Join our Discord
join.description: Connect with CTF enthusiasts from all over Sweden in our Discord server.
join.requirements_desc: To join, you need to be active in the Swedish CTF scene and have a reference from an existing member.
join.discord_desc: Our Discord server is a gathering place for CTF players and organizers in Sweden.

event.title: Annual CTF-BBQ
event.description: Each year, we organize a BBQ for CTF-Kongress where members from across the country gather to share knowledge, get to know each other, and discuss the development of the CTF scene in Sweden.

details.title: Event details
details.location_value: Stockholm, location shared privately with guests

activities.title: Activities
activities.item2: Awards for good contributions to the CTF scene

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Anyone who is a member of the network is welcome to participate. To become a member, you need to be connected to a CTF team/organization and have a reference from an existing member who can vouch for you.
faq.q2: Is there a cost to participate?
faq.a2: Self-cost price for grill and beer! You can BYOB as well

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Do you have questions or want to know more about CTF-Kongress? We're happy to help!

about.title: About us
about.description: CTF-Kongress is a network that brings together Capture The Flag teams and competition organizers throughout Sweden. We meet in the forum on Discord and at the annual CTF-Kongress event.
about.vision: Our goal is to build a strong CTF scene in Sweden by sharing knowledge and promoting the competition format.
